mdRecord.dcterms:title: Tomb of America's greatest Citizen, Washington, at Mount Vernon, Virginia.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Stereoscopic view of visitors at Washington's tomb. Mounted on gray board. Publisher's imprint on the front of the board reads: Underwood & Underwood, Publishers. New York. London. Toronto-Canada. Ottawa-Kansas. Works and Studios - Sun Sculpture trademark. Washington, D. C. Arlington, N. J. Littleton, N. H. Title - Tomb of America's greatest Citizen, Washington, at Mount Vernon, Virginia. Copyright 1903 Underwood & Underwood. A history of the estate is printed directly onto the back of mount. Titles of the stereograph are printed in English, French, German, Spanish, Swedish and Russian.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Mount Vernon (VA : Estate)
George Washington's Mount Vernon
Tomb
